title: Trulieve: The Confidence That Profit Brings
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Trulieve recently reported earnings and is getting a lot of shareholder love - we take a deeper dive into the numbers in a frank conversation with CEO Kim Rivers. We talk growth despite onerous banking regulations, incremental momentum on 280E, why discipline matters and building a hub model across the US. We also discuss issuing debt and the salient lesson that capital markets aren't always available so can't rely on them to run your business. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
